ShortDescription.Value: Automatically renames vehicles to include it's origin information on spawn

Publish.LongDescription:
# Auto Vehicle Renamer This mod renames most vehicles with it's origin information when it spawns.
## Features * Automatically renames vehicles from buildings with custom names or from outside connections * Optional renaming of vehicles from buildings with default names * Customizable separator * Selectable formatting
## What does it rename? #### Service Vehicles: * Agent Car * Ambulance * Delivery Trucks * Evacuation Bus * Fire Engine * Firefighting Helicopter * Garbage Truck * Medical Helicopter * Park Maintenance Vehicle * Police Car * Police Helicopter * Post Van * Prison Van * Snowplow #### Public Transport & Cargo * Aircrafts * Bus * Subways * Taxi * Trains * Trams * Watercrafts
### What does it not rename? * Personal Vehicles * Specialized Industry Vehicles
## DISCLAIMER * Safe to add to existing save. (Button in Options can be used to rename all vehicles on the map) * Safe to remove anytime. (Existing renames will exist until the vehicle despawns)
